remarks: Lemma I of [Crawley] p. 118.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jun-2013.)
statement:
cdlemi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemi.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemi.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemi.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemi.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemi.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemi.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemi.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemi.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemi.s $e |- S = ( ( P .\/ ( R ` G ) ) ./\ ( ( ( U ` F ) ` P ) .\/ ( R ` ( G o. `' F ) ) ) ) $.
cdlemi $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( U e. E /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F =/= ( _I |` B ) /\ G =/= ( _I |` B ) /\ ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` G ) ) ) -> ( ( U ` G ) ` P ) = S ) $.
